sections.text:
81-1934.Secretary of State; rules and regulations; adopt; forms.

The secretary shall adopt and promulgate any rules and regulations and provide such forms as are necessary to carry out sections 81-1901 to 81-1936.

SourceLaws 1980, LB 485, ยง 34.
